=GenePTT =
Get the number of GenePTT available:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/count]

Get one GenePTT by !ProteinGi:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/148558178]

Get from/to GenePTT by range:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/1/3]

Get GenePTTs from a PTT file:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/chromosome/NC_009504]

Get GenePTTs from a PTT file using from/to range:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/chromosome/NC_009504/700077/744610]

Search GenePTTs by string using % (Search over the fields: !ProteinGi, PTT File name, Gene symbol, locustag, in this order. Use %25 for the wildcard):

    !ProteinGi:
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/search/148558178]
    PTT File name:
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/search/NC_01739%25]
    Gene symbol:
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/search/4hbD]
    Locustag:
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/geneptt/search/AM1_H0113]
